description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is resistant to radiant damage.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of Aberrations and Undead within 60 feet of it.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

Difficult terrain composed of nonmagical plants doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Horn attack, or it makes two Horn Bolt attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Ranged Spell Attack: [[/attack]], range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

The unicorn can cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.YEjQ3ADloS9QFghm]{dancing lights} and @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.rwGcFyilX3avbA5E]{druidcraft} cantrips at will, requiring no material components and using WIS as the spellcasting ability.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches another creature. The target magically regains [[/healing average]] and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

When a creature the unicorn can see within 30 feet of it, including the unicorn, is attacked, the unicorn can surround it with a shimmering shield of radiant light. The target adds 3 to its AC against the attack.

Note: An Active Effect is available to enable in the Effects tab of the character sheet to add the AC bonus.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half is speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

The unicorn raises its hooves glowing with golden light and brings them down with a reverberating stomp. Each hostile creature within 10 feet of the unicorn must make a [[/save format=long]]. On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t knocked prone.
